title: FS/FT SGC Graded T206 HOF: Beckley, Clarke, and Wheat Reduced Again!
author: Chris D.

posts.post_title: FS/FT SGC Graded T206 HOF: Beckley, Clarke, and Wheat Reduced Again!
posts.post_content:
Prices are delivered. Paypal gift, or if using regular Paypal add 3%. Paypal address is [url]cdiaz1069@gmail.com[/url]. Please forgive my scanner. First "I'll take it" gets it. Thanks.

Will consider trades for SGC E95's and E96's.

Piedmont Beckley SGC 30: $53
Sweet Caporal Clarke SGC 10: $33
Piedmont Wheat SGC 20: $124 - card look EX+, date stamp on back brings it down; Oct 8, 1911
